naslov: Luksuzna vila s bazenom i panoramskim pogledom na more - Brela (prodaja)
opis: Posredujemo u prodaji novoizgrađene luksuzne vile koja savršeno spaja dalmatinski šarm i vrhunsku modernu arhitekturu. Smještena na jedinstvenoj i mirnoj lokaciji, vila pruža apsolutnu privatnost i sigurnost, zahvaljujući položaju na kojem je daljnja gradnja onemogućena. Ovo je zaista posebna nekretnina koji nudi ne samo udobnost i luksuz, već i skladan život u prirodnom okruženju s panoramskim pogledom na more i Biokovo. Vila se prostire na tri etaže, pažljivo osmišljene kako bi svaka prostorija ispunila očekivanja najzahtjevnijih kupaca. ** Prizemlje se sastoji od prostranog ulaznog prostora koji vodi u modernu kuhinju s blagovaonicom i dnevnim boravkom. Dvije udobne spavaće sobe i elegantno uređena kupaonica također se nalaze na ovoj etaži. Vanjski dio prizemlja obogaćen je natkrivenim pomoćnim objektom s ugrađenim kaminom, sudoperom i električnom pločom, savršenim za uživanje u obrocima na otvorenom bez obzira na vremenske uvjete. Posebnu čar pruža grijani bazen opasan visokim zidovima, koji omogućuje privatnost i uživanje. ** Prvi kat ove vile nudi dodatnu razinu luksuza, s čak četiri prostrane spavaće sobe, svaka s vlastitom kupaonicom. Svaka soba ima izlaz na balkon ili terasu, čime je osigurana jednaka udobnost svim stanarima. Na ovom katu nalazi se i vešeraj, praktičan dodatak koji doprinosi funkcionalnosti doma. ** Na drugom katu nalaze se sadržaji koji ovu vilu pretvaraju u savršeno luksuzno utočište. Moderna teretana, sauna, prostrana terasa s jacuzzijem te vanjski roštilj su predviđeni kako bi ponudili jedinstven spoj opuštanja, rekreacije i užitka. Posebna pažnja posvećena je tehnologiji, kvaliteti materijala i opremljenosti. • Mitsubishi Electric klima uređaji • Podno grijanje u svim kupaonicama. • Talijanska keramika. • Salamander prozori. • MDF kuhinjski elementi s compact pločama. • Kuhinjski otok sa quartz kamenom. • Internet pojačivači signala u svakoj prostoriji. • Sustav vanjskog videonadzora. • Punjač za električne automobile. • Priprema za solarnu elektranu. Grijani bazen je posebno dizajniran za potpuni užitak, s hidromasažnim sustavom, slapom i sustavom za elektrolizu koji održava kvalitetu vode. Obložen je visokokvalitetnom Renolit Touch folijom koja osigurava dugotrajnost i estetski dojam. Vilu krasi i lijepo uređena okućnica površine 400m² koja dijelom omogućava parking za četiri automobila. Udaljenosti : Makarska 12 km, Split, 50 km, Splitski aerodrom 68 km, Dubrovnik 180 km Vila će biti potpuno dovršena i useljiva 15.03.2025. godine. Razgled ove unikatne nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz prethodno potpisivanje Ugovora o posredovanju, u skladu s važećim zakonima o zaštiti podataka i posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. Cijena: na upit Kupac plaća agencijsku proviziju. Kontakt: 091/561-5115 – Željana ********************************************************************************** Luxury Villa with Pool and Panoramic Sea View - Brela We are mediating the sale of a newly built luxury villa that perfectly blends Dalmatian charm with top-tier modern architecture. Situated in a unique and peaceful location, this villa offers absolute privacy and security, thanks to its position where further construction is prohibited. This is truly a unique property that provides not only comfort and luxury but also harmonious living in a natural environment with panoramic views of the sea and Biokovo Mountain. The villa spans three meticulously designed floors, ensuring every room meets the expectations of even the most discerning buyers. Ground Floor ** The ground floor consists of a spacious entrance area leading to a modern kitchen with a dining room and living area. Two comfortable bedrooms and a stylishly designed bathroom are also located on this floor. The outdoor area is enhanced by a covered annex equipped with a built-in fireplace, sink, and electric cooktop—perfect for enjoying al fresco dining in any weather. A special highlight is the heated swimming pool, surrounded by high walls, providing complete privacy and enjoyment. ** First Floor The first floor offers an additional level of luxury with four spacious bedrooms, each with its own en-suite bathroom. Every room has access to a balcony or terrace, ensuring equal comfort for all residents. This floor also features a laundry room, adding practicality to the home’s functionality. ** Second Floor The second floor is dedicated to amenities that transform this villa into the ultimate luxury retreat. A modern gym, sauna, spacious terrace with a jacuzzi, and outdoor barbecue are designed to provide a unique blend of relaxation, recreation, and enjoyment. Features and Specifications Special attention has been given to technology, material quality, and equipment: • Mitsubishi Electric air conditioning units • Underfloor heating in all bathrooms • Italian ceramics • Salamander windows • MDF kitchen elements with compact countertops • Kitchen island featuring quartz stone • Internet signal boosters in every room • Outdoor video surveillance system • Electric car charging station • Pre-installation for a solar power plant The swimming pool is specially designed for ultimate enjoyment, featuring a hydro-massage system, waterfall, and an electrolysis system to maintain water quality. It is lined with high-quality Renolit Touch foil, ensuring durability and an elegant appearance. The villa is complemented by a beautifully landscaped garden spanning 400 m², which includes a parking area for up to four vehicles. Location and Distances • Makarska: 12 km • Split: 50 km • Split Airport: 68 km • Dubrovnik: 180 km Property viewings are available exclusively upon the signing of a Brokerage Agreement, in accordance with applicable real estate regulations and data protection laws. Price: Upon request Agency commission is applicable. Contact: +385 91 561 5115 – Željana
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Sustav grijanja, klimatizacije i ventilacije
